'''Lug''' was an [[orcs|Orc]] slain by [[Tuor]] in [[Gondolin]].<ref>{{LT2|Index}}, entry "Lug"</ref>

== History ==
During the [[Fall of Gondolin]], Lug was among those Orcs which assailed the [[Gondothlim]] alongside the [[Balrogs]] at the coming of the [[Dragons|Drakes]]. Lug was ultimately slain by Tuor, who smote him with his axe, [[Dramborleg]], which cut his limbs out from beneath him in the process.<ref name="LT2Gondolin">{{LT2|III}}, p. 181</ref>

== Etymology ==
''Lug'' or ''L没g''<ref>{{PE|15}}, p. 28</ref> is a [[Gnomish]] name meaning "[[Snakes|snake]]". Its [[Qenya]] form was ''L么ke''.<ref>{{PE|13}}, p. 105</ref>

== Other versions of the legendarium ==
Lug never appeared within any of Tolkien's writing after "[[The Fall of Gondolin (chapter)|The Fall of Gondolin]]" in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.
